title: John Martyn - Solid Air 1973 - Original / Remastered
description:
Solid Air is one of the defining moments in British folk. It flows beautifully and shows the entire spectrum of music that John Martyn has at his fingertips. 

The album has continued to receive acclaim and is included in the book 1001 Albums You Must Hear Before You Die by Robert Dimery. 

It was rated as the 67th Greatest British Album Ever by the British music magazine Q, and was also included in their list of Best Chill-Out Albums Of All Time.

It's a classic with not a note out of place.




John Martyn


Solid Air


1973

 

CD / 2013 / 320Kbps



Tracklist:


1. Solid Air

2. Over The Hill 

3. Don't Want To Know 

4. I'd Rather Be The Devil
 
5. Go Down Easy 

6. Dreams By The Sea 

7. May You Never 

8. The Man In The Station 

9. The Easy Blues
